price: Od Gospodara nebesa i Zemlje i onoga što je između njih, Svemilosnoga, Kome neće moći zboriti.
arabic: رَّبِّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِۖ لَا يَمۡلِكُونَ مِنۡهُ خِطَابٗا

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: rabbi al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wamā baynahumā al-raḥmāni lā yamlikūna min'hu khiṭāban
